lyrics.japanese: 言葉にできず凍えたままで
lyrics.romaji: kotoba ni dekizu kogoeta mama de
lyrics.english: Unable to put into words, remaining frozen

lyrics.japanese: 人前ではやさしく生きていた
lyrics.romaji: hitomae de wa yasashiku ikite ita
lyrics.english: I lived gently in front of others

lyrics.japanese: しわよせで こんなふうに雑に
lyrics.romaji: shiwayose de konna fuu ni zatsu ni
lyrics.english: Due to the consequences, so carelessly like this

lyrics.japanese: 雨の夜にきみを抱きしめてた
lyrics.romaji: ame no yoru ni kimi wo dakishimete ta
lyrics.english: I was holding you on that rainy night

lyrics.japanese: 道路わきのビラと壊れた常夜燈
lyrics.romaji: douro waki no bira to kowareta jouyatou
lyrics.english: Flyers by the roadside and broken streetlights

lyrics.japanese: 街角ではそう だれもが急いでた
lyrics.romaji: machikado de wa sou daremo ga isoide ta
lyrics.english: On street corners, yes, everyone was in a hurry

lyrics.japanese: きみじゃない 悪いのは自分の激しさを
lyrics.romaji: kimi ja nai warui no wa jibun no hageshisa wo
lyrics.english: It's not you, what's bad is my own intensity

lyrics.japanese: かくせないぼくのほうさ
lyrics.romaji: kakusenai boku no hou sa
lyrics.english: That I can't hide, it's me

lyrics.japanese: Lady きみは雨にけむる
lyrics.romaji: Lady kimi wa ame ni kemuru
lyrics.english: Lady, you're obscured by the rain

lyrics.japanese: すいた駅を少し走った
lyrics.romaji: suita eki wo sukoshi hashitta
lyrics.english: You ran a little through the empty station

lyrics.japanese: どしゃぶりでもかまわないと
lyrics.romaji: doshaburi demo kamawanai to
lyrics.english: Even in a downpour, I don't care

lyrics.japanese: ずぶぬれでもかまわないと
lyrics.romaji: zubunure demo kamawanai to
lyrics.english: Even soaking wet, I don't care

lyrics.japanese: しぶきあげるきみが消えてく
lyrics.romaji: shibuki ageru kimi ga kiete ku
lyrics.english: You disappear, splashing water

lyrics.japanese: Oh oh 路地裏では朝が早いから
lyrics.romaji: Oh oh rojiura de wa asa ga hayai kara
lyrics.english: Oh oh, because morning comes early in the back alleys

lyrics.japanese: 今のうちにきみをつかまえ
lyrics.romaji: ima no uchi ni kimi wo tsukamae
lyrics.english: I'll catch you while I can now

lyrics.japanese: 行かないで 行かないで
lyrics.romaji: ikanaide ikanaide
lyrics.english: Don't go, don't go

lyrics.japanese: そう言うよ oh oh ooh hoo, ooh hoo
lyrics.romaji: sou iu yo oh oh ooh hoo, ooh hoo
lyrics.english: That's what I say oh oh ooh hoo, ooh hoo

lyrics.japanese: 別々に暮らす 泣きだしそうな空を
lyrics.romaji: betsubetsu ni kurasu nakidashi sou na sora wo
lyrics.english: Living separately under a sky that seems about to cry

lyrics.japanese: にぎりしめる強さは今はもうない
lyrics.romaji: nigirishimeru tsuyosa wa ima wa mou nai
lyrics.english: I no longer have the strength to hold tight

lyrics.japanese: 変わらずいる心のすみだけで
lyrics.romaji: kawarazu iru kokoro no sumi dake de
lyrics.english: Only in the unchanged corner of my heart

lyrics.japanese: 傷つくようなきみならもういらない
lyrics.romaji: kizutsuku you na kimi nara mou iranai
lyrics.english: If you're the kind who gets hurt, I don't need you anymore

lyrics.japanese: Lady きみは雨にぬれて
lyrics.romaji: Lady kimi wa ame ni nurete
lyrics.english: Lady, you're wet from the rain

lyrics.japanese: ぼくの眼を少し見ていた
lyrics.romaji: boku no me wo sukoshi mite ita
lyrics.english: You were looking at my eyes a little

lyrics.japanese: どしゃぶりでもかまわないと
lyrics.romaji: doshaburi demo kamawanai to
lyrics.english: Even in a downpour, I don't care

lyrics.japanese: ずぶぬれでもかまわないと
lyrics.romaji: zubunure demo kamawanai to
lyrics.english: Even soaking wet, I don't care

lyrics.japanese: 口笛ふくぼくがついてく oh oh
lyrics.romaji: kuchibue fuku boku ga tsuite ku oh oh
lyrics.english: I follow, whistling oh oh

lyrics.japanese: ずいぶんきみを知りすぎたのに
lyrics.romaji: zuibun kimi wo shirisugita no ni
lyrics.english: Even though I knew you too well

lyrics.japanese: 初めて争った夜のように
lyrics.romaji: hajimete arasotta yoru no you ni
lyrics.english: Like the night we first fought

lyrics.japanese: 行かないで 行かないで
lyrics.romaji: ikanaide ikanaide
lyrics.english: Don't go, don't go

lyrics.japanese: そう言うよ oh oh ooh hoo, ooh hoo
lyrics.romaji: sou iu yo oh oh ooh hoo, ooh hoo
lyrics.english: That's what I say oh oh ooh hoo, ooh hoo

lyrics.japanese: 肩が乾いたシャツ 改札を出る頃
lyrics.romaji: kata ga kawaita shatsu kaisatsu wo deru koro
lyrics.english: When leaving the ticket gate with a dry-shouldered shirt

lyrics.japanese: きみの町じゃもう雨は小降りになる
lyrics.romaji: kimi no machi ja mou ame wa koburi ni naru
lyrics.english: In your town, the rain has already become a drizzle

lyrics.japanese: 今日だけが明日に続いてる
lyrics.romaji: kyou dake ga ashita ni tsuzuiteru
lyrics.english: Only today continues into tomorrow

lyrics.japanese: こんなふうに きみとは終われない
lyrics.romaji: konna fuu ni kimi to wa owarenai
lyrics.english: I can't end it with you like this

lyrics.japanese: Lady きみは今もこうして
lyrics.romaji: Lady kimi wa ima mo kou shite
lyrics.english: Lady, you're still like this now

lyrics.japanese: 小さめの傘もささずに
lyrics.romaji: chiisame no kasa mo sasazu ni
lyrics.english: Without even holding a small umbrella

lyrics.japanese: どしゃぶりでもかまわないと
lyrics.romaji: doshaburi demo kamawanai to
lyrics.english: Even in a downpour, I don't care

lyrics.japanese: ずぶぬれでもかまわないと
lyrics.romaji: zubunure demo kamawanai to
lyrics.english: Even soaking wet, I don't care

lyrics.japanese: しぶきあげるきみが消えてく oh oh
lyrics.romaji: shibuki ageru kimi ga kiete ku oh oh
lyrics.english: You disappear, splashing water oh oh

lyrics.japanese: 路地裏では朝が早いから
lyrics.romaji: rojiura de wa asa ga hayai kara
lyrics.english: Because morning comes early in the back alleys

lyrics.japanese: 今のうちにきみをつかまえ
lyrics.romaji: ima no uchi ni kimi wo tsukamae
lyrics.english: I'll catch you while I can now

lyrics.japanese: 行かないで 行かないで
lyrics.romaji: ikanaide ikanaide
lyrics.english: Don't go, don't go

lyrics.japanese: そう言うよ
lyrics.romaji: sou iu yo
lyrics.english: That's what I say

lyrics.japanese: どしゃぶりでもかまわないと
lyrics.romaji: doshaburi demo kamawanai to
lyrics.english: Even in a downpour, I don't care

lyrics.japanese: ずぶぬれでもかまわないと
lyrics.romaji: zubunure demo kamawanai to
lyrics.english: Even soaking wet, I don't care

lyrics.romaji: kuchibue fuku boku ga tsuite ku oh oh
lyrics.english: I follow, whistling oh oh

lyrics.romaji: zuibun kimi wo shirisugita no ni
lyrics.english: Even though I knew you too well

lyrics.japanese: 初めて争った夜のように
lyrics.romaji: hajimete arasotta yoru no you ni
lyrics.english: Like the night we first fought

lyrics.romaji: ikanaide ikanaide
lyrics.english: Don't go, don't go
